1.0.name: wordpress/welcome
1.0.description: The plugin allows the user to display a nice welcome message to its visitors with fade out feature. The main advantage is that your visitors will see a nice welcome message while the main page is loading. It includes a WYSIWYG(what-you-see-is-what-you-get) editor for easy management, a color picker to chose a background for the welcome message and adjustable timings. Demo, screenshots, support: http://kettlerdorothea.ro/welcome-plugin-10
